name: 2020 RELEASE | Magister Magic
description:
Trigstur's Magister Magic |
By : Trigstur |

Version : 2020 | 0.0.2
additional_info:
Magister Magic is one of the best magister reskins since 2017, thats great and all but we noticed Iddink scrambled up some things... andddd we couldn't leave all our users like that. And that's why from here Magister Magic will continue. 

[!] We recommend Stylus => https://github.com/openstyles/stylus

Install directly with Stylus => https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Trigstur/MagisterMagic/master/dist/main.user.css

-- Includes --

:: custom colors ( soon to be more advanced )

^ Easily adjustable with Stylus ( Check The Github ) ^
---- https://github.com/Trigstur/MagisterMagic ---- 

:: a proper (nice looking) sidebar

:: collapse button for ELO displayed properly on all pages

:: centered account (login) page

-- Contact --

Github : https://github.com/Trigstur/MagisterMagic
Current Version : https://github.com/Trigstur/MagisterMagic/blob/master/dist/main.css
